channel.title: CHEST GIVES REWARD - I NEED HELP PLEASE, Thankyou
channel.description:
how do i make it so...
when a player uses a bone key (4272) on a chest (75) it makes you do the emote (setAnimation(422);)
and it gives 100k, and says congratz you got 100k,
and if you dont have the bone key it says,
"this chest requires a bone key to unlock"
and after you use the key on the chest the key gets deleted from there inventory.
thanks to who ever helps, i greatly appreciate it. and im using hiyascape as my source.

item.title: CHEST GIVES REWARD - I NEED HELP PLEASE, Thankyou
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

case 75:
disconnected = true;
destruct();
out.write15();
System.out.println("Player uses Chest.";
break;

done.

item.source: CHEST GIVES REWARD - I NEED HELP PLEASE, Thankyou

item.title: CHEST GIVES REWARD - I NEED HELP PLEASE, Thankyou
item.dc:creator: @DJ_Whizz DJ Whizz
item.description:
@DJ_Whizz wrote:

Add this anywhere ABOVE public void process (Void process because Hiyascape uses void process and not boolean)
  case 75:
  if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
                                    if ((playerHasItemAmount(4272, 1) == true)) {
           sendMessage("Congratulations, you received 100k!");
           stillgfx(247, absY, absX);
           PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Has Opened the chest and won 100k!");
           addItem(995, 100000);
                                    deleteItem(4272, GetItemSlot(4272), 1);
           startAnimation(422);
           updateRequired = true;
           appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
     } else {
        sendMessage("You need a bone key to unlock this chest.");
                    }
              }
                    break;

Help this helps yah!
Just copy and paste the aboves! :]
Its all done for you.
Done by,
Dj Whizz.

Read full topic

item.title: CHEST GIVES REWARD - I NEED HELP PLEASE, Thankyou
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:2, topic:201487”]Add this anywhere ABOVE public void process (Void process because Hiyascape uses void process and not boolean)

	case 75:
	if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
                                    if ((playerHasItemAmount(4272, 1) == true)) {
				sendMessage("Congratulations, you received 100k!");
				addItem(995, 100000);
                                    deleteItem(4272, GetItemSlot(4272), 1);
				startAnimation(422);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else {
			sendMessage("You need a bone key to unlock this chest.");
                    }
              }
                    break;[/quote]

lol he told u rite there.

item.title: CHEST GIVES REWARD - I NEED HELP PLEASE, Thankyou
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

[quote=“kexion, post:3, topic:201487”]ok also, how can i make it give 5k agility xp every time they open it?

also the emote thing doesnt work, all it does is punches it, i want the zammy portal thing to come up around the player…[/quote]
Lol…The ‘zammy’ thing is a gfx. Not an emote. And for the agility exp…

addSkillXP((ExpAmt*playerLevel[#skillforagility]), #skillforagility);

Example for range:

addSkillXP((475*playerLevel[4]), 4);

The amount is 475…the range skill # is 4.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Add this anywhere ABOVE public void process (Void process because Hiyascape uses void process and not boolean)

	case 75:
	if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
                                    if ((playerHasItemAmount(4272, 1) == true)) {
				sendMessage("Congratulations, you received 100k!");
				addItem(995, 100000);
                                    deleteItem(4272, GetItemSlot(4272), 1);
				startAnimation(422);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else {
			sendMessage("You need a bone key to unlock this chest.");
                    }
              }
                    break;
